name: John
comment: Do you still have tickets for today's game?

name: Staff
comment: Yes, we still have them. Which seat would you like?

name: Staff
comment: Then here you are. Please take the stair on your right side after going through the entrance.

name: Tony
comment: We were a little late but what about the game?

name: John
comment: Giants are losing by 2: 3. But Carter have a turn at bat and it's a chance scene!

name: John
comment: That was impressive! It was perfect!
